shadow.name: SUPERFICIALITY
shadow.description: Living on the surface, avoiding depth
shadow.thought_pattern: I don't have time to pause. I need to keep moving.

gift.name: SELF-ASSURANCE
gift.thought_pattern: I know myself. I speak from depth, not reactivity.

siddhi.name: PRESENCE
siddhi.description: Pure witnessing consciousness, the eternal now
siddhi.thought_pattern: I am here. Fully. Nothing else exists.

inversion_protocols.script: You are living on the surface because depth feels threatening. Gate 20 is the gate of the nowâ€”it manifests presence through contemplation. When you avoid stillness, you avoid yourself. True self-assurance comes from deep self-knowing, which requires pausing. Stop running.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Stop all activity. Sit. Feel your body. Be here for 10 minutes without doing anything. Notice the discomfort.

experiment.hypothesis: If I practice daily contemplation for 14 days, self-assurance will increase.
experiment.action: Daily: 20 minutes of contemplative stillness. No phone, no input. Just be. Journal insights.

success_criteria.target: Increased comfort with stillness, greater self-knowledge
